content.description: There is an obvious vine arete located on the far NE corner of building.
content.location: Once at the Wolf Law Building, proceed to the far north east corner of the building.

content.description: On the SE corner of Wolf Law, follow the dihedral up with easy stemming. about 15 feet up, traverse directly left on the face until a ledge is reached.
content.location: This is the SE corner of Wolf Law.

content.description: On the West side of Wolf Law, you will find numerous pillars that lead up to a porch area. Any one of these will do. I climb the pillar farthest North to avoid being seen from the busy road as much as possible. At night, these are have light shining on them, so be careful not to be seen.
content.location: This is on the West side of Wolf Law.

content.description: On the East side of Wolf Law, there are several pillars. In between which, there are metal gates/mesh/whatever you want to call them. Traverse the pillars using the metal. There is no need to go higher than 2 feet up, but feel free. Good route to build calluses. BONUS POINTS - don't use metal.
content.location: This is on the East side of Thre Wolf Law Building.

content.description:
This is on the East side of Wolf Law, just north of the

Industrial Traverse

(you can link with the

Industrial Traverse

) but South of

Vine and Dine

. Look for the large black doorway that is bigger than the average door. Climb up one side, then traverse the top of the doorway with your feet on the bricks above it.
content.location: This is on the East side of Wolf Law near the door that faces North.
